name: Find Path
description:
The goal of the game is to create a road between 2 cities.

Diagonal road construction is prohibited!

There are 5 types of terrain:
1) Field - light green
2) Forest - dark green
3) Mountain - grey
4) Desert - yellow
5) Sea - blue

Click on a cell to find out what is needed to build a road.



In the beginning, you will always be given enough money, but you can always take more via "Extra Money" button. You can buy resources in the market and craft what you need to build a road.

Just click on the crafting board to put a resource there (first click - stone, second - wood, third - clear).
